snippet: The election-year fight over the administration’s birth control policy escalated, with a Georgetown law student and the radio host Rush Limbaugh taking center stage in the conflict.
abstract: The election-year fight over the administration’s birth control policy escalated, with a Georgetown law student and the radio host Rush Limbaugh taking center stage in the conflict.

headline.main: Obama Backs Student in Furor With Limbaugh on Birth Control
headline.print_headline: Obama Backs Student in Birth Control Furor
